clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Focal increased uptake in femur, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Focal uptake in femur consistent with post-surgical changes.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
